title: The Flying Pumpkin That Shoots Laser Beams Out Of Its Ass

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- In the night, you may shoot somebody. This has a 25% chance to miss and do nothing.
- Aim: Your next attack will never miss if it hits an evil target, and it will have a 75% chance to miss if you attack someone innocent. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You have a 25% chance to survive each attack against you.
